trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is thrown when reading is attempted past the end of a stream.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxx xx x xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: The content of message is intended to be understood by humans.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxxx xx $xx$xxxxxxx$$xx$ xx xxxxxxxx xx xx xxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: The caller of this constructor is required to ensure that this string has been localized for the current system culture.
trans-unit.target: Xxx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xxxx xxxx xxxxxx xxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

The exception that is the cause of the current exception.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx.

trans-unit.source: If the innerException parameter is not null, the current exception is raised in a catch block that handles the inner exception.
trans-unit.target: Xx xxx $xx$xxxxxXxxxxxxxx$$xx$ xxxxxxxxx xx xxx $xxxxxx$xxxx$$xxxxxx$$ xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx x $xxxxxx$xxxxx$$xxxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxxx.
